Workflows.Workflow: Select 'select c.cust_id as номер_клиента, c.last_name as Фамилия, c.first_name as Имя, ca.PHONE1 as Телефон, ak.VIP as VIP, ca.ADDRESS4 as Бонус_процент, c.FST_SALE_DATE as первая_продажа, c.LST_SALE_DATE as послед_покупка, c.CUST_SID as SID_клиента, c.CREATED_DATE as дата_созд, ak.CALL_OFF_SC as Бонусный_счет From cms.customer c inner join cms.cust_address ca on c.CUST_SID = ca.cust_sid left join AKS.CUST_SC_PARAM ak on c.CUST_SID = ak.CUST_SID where c.ACTIVE=1 and ca.PHONE1 like ''%+7%'' and ca.address4 is not null group by c.CUST_ID, c.last_name, c.first_name, ca.PHONE1, ak.VIP, ca.ADDRESS4, c.FST_SALE_DATE , c.LST_SALE_DATE, c.CUST_SID, c.CREATED_DATE, ak.CALL_OFF_SC order by c.last_name' As QUERY, 'Clients' As LIST_NAME, 'c:\docs\clients_list.dat'As FILE_PATH, 'true' as "Append", '\t' As COL_SPAN, '\r\n' As ROW_SPAN From dual
